title: FS: McGraw, Chance, Chesbro in high grades and very scarce backs!

posts.post_title: FS: McGraw, Chance, Chesbro in high grades and very scarce backs!
posts.post_content:
All 4 cards are extremely strong with super clean backs. Pics coming shortly, or you may email me for them immediately at [url]kmize1999@yahoo.com[/url]

John McGraw (Port.) PSA 7/ SCap 150 fact. 30, corners are 9's and the color and snow white borders are unbelievable......$2250
John McGraw (Portrait with cap) SGC 84/ SCap 350-460 fact. 42 OP, extremely difficult back, sharp corners & well centered.....$2000
Jack Chesbro PSA 6/ SCap 150 fact. 25, PSA Pop report shows only 3 of all grades!! Impossible back, 50/50 centering......$1750
Frank Chance (Yellow Port.) SGC 80/ SCap 350 fact. 30, well centered and fantastic color, a PSA 6 just sold for $1850.......$1250
